CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( project_cloud__Hours__c ), project_cloud__Percentage_of_Work_Day__c * 8, project_cloud__Hours__c / project_cloud__Working_Days__c ) * project_cloud__Number_People__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will calculate the number of hours per day to be expected from the Resource Request multiplied by the amount of people needed.
CustomField.label: Hours Per Day (Calculated)
